Hi all,

   At the W3C we have developed a protocol called WebID which allo=
ws RESTful authentication using only well established standards. It is desi=
gned to be RESTful, and can only become more so. But it would be very good =
to have some feedback from the community here to help us improve the langua=
ge where possible.

   http://www.w3.org/2005/Incubator/webid/spec/

The ed=
itors draft is here, and is evolving cosntantly

   https://dvcs.w3.org/hg/=
WebID/raw-file/tip/spec/index-respec.html

We get people from many differen=
t backgrounds working together and when one is in the middle of editing som=
ething it is difficult to see it a fresh. Keen fresh eyes are welcome. :-)
=


Henry

Social Web Architect
http://bblfish.net/
